channel.title: Client.Java and Npc Handler
channel.description: Hey, everyone thanks for coming to try and help i have recently started making a server. Now that i have it up and running, i have a problem, i can't change what goes in the client.java and npc handler. Like when i change something it changes, but when i get in the game, it doesnot change! Im doing complie then runserver. But i dont know now. If you can help plz do, if u need me to post the client.java, and the npc handler just tell me. Thank you everyone

item.title: Client.Java and Npc Handler
item.dc:creator: @Ballingscape_Owner Ballingscape_Owner
item.description:
@Ballingscape_Owner wrote:

oo so how do i change the .cfg to .class?

Read full topic

item.title: Client.Java and Npc Handler
item.dc:creator: @csrsniper254 csrsniper254
item.description:
@csrsniper254 wrote:

If you have ANY errors compiling the file will not be changed to .class making the update not take effect. You can edit shops because it is .cfg

Read full topic

item.title: Client.Java and Npc Handler
item.dc:creator: @aaronr69 aaronr69
item.description:
@aaronr69 wrote:

alos somtimes if you have any errors it wont let you compile correctly

Read full topic

item.title: Client.Java and Npc Handler
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

Hmm… Is it testscape? If it is, alot of people have problems with this…
Testscape has some bugs in it not allowing some updates…

Read full topic

item.title: Client.Java and Npc Handler
item.dc:creator: @Ballingscape_Owner Ballingscape_Owner
item.description:
@Ballingscape_Owner wrote:

I have tried useing notbad and all that, i can change shopos, and all that stuff. I can’t figure out what that one guy was saying with blah blah blah

So if you can explain more into depth that would be nice. Thank you so much

Read full topic

item.title: Client.Java and Npc Handler
item.dc:creator: @Oo_Java Oo Java
item.description:
@Oo_Java wrote:

most likely because you’ve downloaded that source when they are read only files or you’re opening them in another program…

try opening with notepad or textpad…

Read full topic

item.title: Client.Java and Npc Handler
item.dc:creator: @Enum Enum
item.description:
@Enum wrote:

[code][code]Hey there, please make sure you are pressing save and you are compiling it.To compile in the command prompt type:

cd location_here

then

javac client.java

Or whatever file edited, then
[/code]java client[/code]

Read full topic
